channel.title: Moparscape servers
channel.description: How do I go on somebody else's server on Moparscape? Somebody please tell me :( I will be really gr8full

item.title: Moparscape servers
item.dc:creator: @legendofjon legendofjon
item.description:
@legendofjon wrote:

It’s really easy
follow the step below
1)go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
2)select what server you want
3)choose high or low detail(type ctrl so it can go on new tab)
4)once it’s done loading click file, select the first option (should be something about ip)
5)examine this
Name: IP: Port: Uptime: Since: Play (select detail):
->Darkpkscape<- darkscape2007.servegame.com 43594 60% 06-21-07 High / Low

that’s just an example.
from there copy the ip, and on mopar webclient, click file , select first option and the paste.
Do the samething for port, but add this #:

Read full topic
